WSO2 Governance Registry - User Guide
User Profile Management
The User Profile Management component of the WSO2 Carbon facilitates the management and control of user's details. The key functionality of this component include:
Add new profiles
Add and modify details of a user in profile
The user profile component can be invoked in two ways.
Administrator or a person with "Manage Security" functionality can add/edit/view profiles of users
If the product is configured, the user himself can edit his profile
External profiles of a JDBC user store can be viewed only
Figure 1: User Profile Management
Use the Add New Profile link to add new user accounts. To delete profiles use Delete link. The default profile of a user cannot be deleted. Click on the profile name to add/edit details of the profile.
Figure 2: Add/edit user details
You also can add a profile to the registry as a resource.
